name: pkehler
text: I do like boats!

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by dismas, KaMeT, TonyHighwind, StagnantDisplay, willard34, farqussus, Darthemed)

name: tekende
text: That answer could use some work!

name: mattylite
text: You're workin' some rough chuckles these days, saint

name: saint
text: yarp.

name: spinynorman
text:
I laughed. Pretty hard.

Okay, fine. I am still laughing at such an idea.

name: leftsaidtim
text: Daaaaaaaaaamn. Someone's being a dick about boats.

name: zem
text: two interesting comments. three direct quotes from the strip. the quotes have more chubbies.

name: deimosrising
text: The tommy gun did not progress out of the conceptual stages, which seems unfortunate until you consider what Pat might have used it for.

name: apocowarg
text: That would have been a hella bad day for any barbers on the open seas.

name: mystkmanat
text: once, twice, a thousand times chubbied!

name: jaldor
text: Like on the Barbary coast?

name: fuzzyshoo
text: it did, but since it was part of the trailer it never made it onto the water.

name: xud
text: Killin Suckas is important

name: invidious
text: When I die, I can only hope that someone turns the engine off for stealth and I become the victim of a row-by shooting.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: before or after you're dead?

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by JTTuba, mighty_pit, SotiCoto)

name: tekende
text: That is a given.

name: qatipay
text: If Ray is a cat, this is a very small boat.

name: m3funkyb
text: the final strip is somewhat reminescent of my middle school days drawing out elabatorate concepts of badace inventions and melee weapons

name: epicurus
text:
Beat me to it - this is exactly what every attempt to be responsible and plan things in advance turned into until about age 18 or so.

The clincher on this one is that they used "w/" instead of writing "with", as if that makes it more technical or something?

name: urine_cop
text: I see the "w/" being more in line of quick note taking. Teodor doesn't have time to spare with the hell of ideas  Ray's giving him.

name: spinynorman
text:
I remember that stuff. Me and a school friend spent hours designing secret agent cars, and the purpose of the cars was pretty much mayhem and destruction, the not secret kind. Exactly who the enemy was was never specified, but we were certain they were going to be fairly diabolical, maybe even fiendish.

I remember once when I passed a drawing to him in the first grade and he tore it up. I flipped out and was like DUDE WHAT THE HELL ARE YOU DOING

I'm tearin' it up so the enemy doesn't get it dude!

...fuck the ENEMY. Fuck THOSE GUYS! I JUST SPENT TWENTY MINUTES DRAWING THAT GODDAMN THING!

I may have embellished the vocabulary but the intent remains the same.

name: rowboat
text:
That was actually the very second at which your friend first realized that he should probably have a girlfriend.

Also, you know how in the old days people would marvel at the rare occasion in which a Manflesh or Asherdan post had a small amount of lames as opposed to, say, forty? Well let me turn it around for a sec: this is the first Spinynorman story I have ever seen without at least five chubbies.

name: spinynorman
text:
He should have had a girlfriend when he was seven?

Also the story is not that good, deserving very few chubbies.

name: rowboat
text:
In this case, "have a girlfriend" can also be taken to mean "take a closer look a mom's underwear catalog."

And I liked the story.

name: heccibiggs
text:
I did too, I thought it was very funny.

"VERY FUNNY" - heccibiggs

name: rowboat
text: "DELIGHTFUL!....AN ABUNDANT, IRRESISTIBLE YARN!" - rowboat

name: heccibiggs
text: Can I just say I kept thinking about Spiny's story last night and cracking up and everyone was like, what? and I was like, ...never mind, like nine times.

name: littlefatdog
text: 'da da da' by trio is indeed a great choice for a theme song

name: atmus
text: It is a nightmarish video though.

name: tekende
text:
Every time I read this strip that song gets stuck in my head for like two hours afterward

And all I can remember of it is the chorus

FUCK

name: pa_ass_nts
text: As a keen boatsman, I can testify that some sort of anti-sucker amenity is essential.

name: deovalente
text: Abbreviating "with" into "w/" for no purpose at all gives this a 5.

name: hellofditties
text: I do this often.

name: deovalente
text: In lieu of a 5, you are hereby chubbied for this fact.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i award you w/ this chubbu

name: hellofditties
text: And I you.

name: mrectomy
text: Always with the Ketel One..

name: octafish
text: Trio's da da da pushes this strips rating by exactly one.
